name: Big Kendama
description:
This Kendama is perfectly suited for performances and a lot of fun.
Created with painted maple (Itaya Kaede or Acer mono). 

Total size is 33 cm, ken (stick) length is 30 cm and the tama (ball) diameter is 10 cm. Differing from the cherry red color of our Official Kendama, this Kendama is made with a deep dark red colour and presented in cool gift box.

This product is recommend by the Japan Kendama Association.

name: Rabbit kendama (White)
description:
Designed around sexagenary cycle of Japanese tradition from the stem to the tama (ball). 

Probably the coolest looking of all the Kendama.

Created with Japanese beech and maple. It is the same size as the Ozora. This product is recommend by the Japan Kendama Association.

This product is not suitable for children under 13 yrs of age, unless it's just to pat!

name: Hardwood Designer Kendama
description:
Created with high quality JapaneseHardwood. This Kendama's sound reverberates wonderfully, and is a great product design piece for you mantle (Decoration you can play with even). The Hardwood designer Kendama also has a very unique wood scent of the Japanese Zelkova (Keyaki), an experience you will feel with all of your senses, yeah. 

It is the same size as the Ozora, and is a product recommended by the Japan Kendama Association.

This product is not suitable for children under 13 yrs of age as it is not very good to eat!

name: Trendy Plain wooden Kendama
description:
The official wooden Kendama. These Kendama's are the real deal originals, straight from Japan. These are NOT the plastic knockoffs that many online stores sell. Light, balanced, symmetrical, and highly addictive. Hours of fun and builds amazing hand-eye coordination. Get yours today, or give one as a gift. Package includes an extra string and instructions. Natural wood flavour too!

Wood material type: domestic beech (ken stick, sara cups) domestic cheery (tama ball).

This product is not suitable for children under 13 yrs of age, too hard aye!

name: Ozora Kendama Single Colors
description:
The official wooden Kendama. 
The Oozora is the current brand of JKA licensed kendama manufactured by Yamagata Koubou, and is the only JKA certified kendama still manufactured in Japan.

Light, balanced, symmetrical, and highly addictive. Hours of fun and builds amazing hand-eye coordination. Get yours today, or give one as a gift. Package includes an extra string and original Japanese packaging. Choose your color below.

Wood material type: domestic beech (ken stick, sara cups) domestic cheery (tama ball).

This product is not suitable for children under 13 yrs of age as they may cry.
